#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
//int heap[1000];

int main()
{
    int i, j,k,  n, check, status;
    int candles[10];
    scanf("%d",&n);

    for(k=0;k<n;k++){
    scanf("%d %d %d %d %d %d %d %d %d %d",&candles[0],&candles[1],&candles[2],&candles[3],&candles[4],&candles[5],&candles[6],&candles[7],&candles[8],&candles[9]);
    check=0;
    status=0;
    while (status==0){
        i=0;
        while ((status!=1)&&(i<=9)){
            if (candles[i]==check) {
                if (i==0) {
                    status=2;
                    //printf("bla");
                }
                else {
                    status=1;
                    for(j=0;j<=check;j++){
                        printf("%d",i);
                    }
                    printf("\n");
                }
            }
            i++;
        }
        if (status==2) {
            printf("1");
            for(j=0;j<=check;j++){
                printf("0");
            }
            printf("\n");
        }
        check++;
    }
}
}
